hero.title: Bite-sized gospel stories that light up every child’s day.
hero.description: Daily Grace Snacks is our animated Bible series for kids and families. Season One travels through the story of redemption—from creation to covenant heroes—using warm storytelling, music, and prayer prompts. Watch the full playlist or jump into any episode below.

season1.title: Season 1 · Foundations of Faith
season1.description: Fifteen short episodes inviting children to know God’s character, promises, and rescuing love.

episodes.title: There Is Only One God
episodes.summary: Kids meet the one true God—Father, Son, and Spirit—and learn why we worship Him alone.

episodes.title: God Created Heaven and Earth
episodes.summary: From light to living creatures, God speaks creation into being and calls it good.

episodes.title: God Made People
episodes.summary: Children discover they are made in God’s image and designed for friendship with Him.

episodes.title: People Sinned
episodes.summary: Sin enters the world, but so does God’s promise to rescue His children.

episodes.title: Noah’s Ark
episodes.summary: God protects Noah’s family and points to the hope of redemption through obedience.

episodes.title: Abraham’s Faith
episodes.summary: Abraham follows God into the unknown and discovers blessing for every nation.

episodes.title: Joseph’s Dreams and Forgiveness
episodes.summary: Joseph’s journey shows how God turns harm into healing when we forgive.

episodes.title: Moses and the Burning Bush
episodes.summary: God speaks through a burning bush and sends Moses to liberate His people.

episodes.title: Exodus and the Red Sea
episodes.summary: The Lord parts the Red Sea and leads Israel into freedom.

episodes.title: The Ten Commandments
episodes.summary: Kids learn why God’s commands protect us and show His holy heart.

episodes.title: David and Goliath
episodes.summary: With a sling and God’s courage, David proves that faith is stronger than fear.

episodes.title: Daniel in the Lions’ Den
episodes.summary: Daniel keeps praying even when it’s risky, and God shuts the lions’ mouths.

episodes.title: Three Friends in the Furnace
episodes.summary: Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego refuse idols and find Jesus in the fire.

episodes.title: Jonah and the Big Fish
episodes.summary: Jonah learns that God’s mercy pursues both runaways and nations.

episodes.title: Elijah and the Ravens
episodes.summary: In famine, God feeds Elijah and proves He is always near.

season2.title: Season 2 · Coming Soon
season2.description: New Testament journeys, parables, and the Spirit-filled Church are arriving in the next drop. Glory Share partners will preview scripts, songs, and early cuts.

ctaSection.title: Share Daily Grace With Your Community
ctaSection.description: Play an episode during children’s worship, send it in your family chat, or host a watch party. Every view plants a gospel seed.
